question: what was the theme of the 4th India Steel 2019 Exhibition and Conference?
option1: The Hegemony in Steel Production: Boosting India's Trade
option2: Balancing Steel Demand & Supply Dynamics: Building a New India
option3: Steel Production and Infrastructure: The Future of India
option4: The Emerging Steel Industry in India: Approaching Self Reliance
answer: Balancing Steel Demand & Supply Dynamics: Building a New India
explanation: The 4th India Steel 2019 Exhibition and Conference was held in Mumbai, Maharashtra. "The theme of the event was Balancing Steel Demand & Supply Dynamics: Building a New India".
